title: Shoei RF-1400 Complete Interior Liner Set
features: Complete set: center pad + cheek pads
Multiple thicknesses available for custom fit
description: Restore your Shoei RF-1400 to factory-fresh comfort. This complete liner set includes the 3D center pad and both cheek pads with Shoei's Max-Dry moisture-wicking system. Available in multiple thicknesses so you can fine-tune the fit as your original pads break in or wear.
